name: Defcon 1: Alien Invasion
description:
Are you ready for the end of the world?

Defcon 1: Alien Invasion is the best experience in strategy and realistic simulation.
Take control of an Alien breed, select a target country and begin a cosmic war against humankind for Earth control. Remember, you need to use all your hi-tech powers to destroy the humans and leave no one alive!

With an impressive alien-themed graphics, you can feel all emotions of a world war in your iPhone & iPad devices. Defcon 1: Alien Invasion has massive improves in gameplay and strategic simulation on App Store. Battle for Planet Earth never will be the same after that, CRUSH ‘EM ALL!

“Smells to a real alien invasion, great!!” -AppStratosphere

“Amazing, lots of fun, love it” -USAbox

“Best strategy game since Plague Inc.” -Phonexciting

“Has all necessary to become the hit of the year” -Appstarters

Features:
▶ Massive war against the world, more than 60 countries to annihilate. (the world is yours!)
▶ 150+ amazing Alien Powers to improve for kill everybody. (who said the war was boring?)
▶ 11 different attack types with special features and strategies each one (master and commander)
▶ iPhone/iPad strategy game improved (cool story bro!)
▶ Stunning alien themed interface and menus (you can feel into a spaceship)
▶ World leaderboards and fun achievements to discover (invade and LMAO)
▶ Permanent world events, news and challenges while you are playing (Know what is happens)

Compatible with iPad (all), iPhone 3GS, 4, 4S, 5 iPod touch (3rd, 4th & 5th). Requires iOS 4.3 or later.
